fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 146.51 lakh crore compared with Rs 247.18 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 gained 44.40 points or 0.26% to settle at 17,151.90. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 1.82% to 14.8075. HDFC Bank, Reliance Industries (RIL) and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The March 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 March 2023.
